title: shankari ninnE
sahitya:
shankari ninnE ika cAla nammitini shankari ninnE ika cAla nammitini


anupallavi

  pankajAkSi nIdu mahima pogaDuTa nA taramA 
pankajAnanE praNatajana shankari shrI tripurasundari


caraNam    kAma janaka vAsudEva sahOdari shyAmaLAngai shiva hrdayOllAsini 
kAmitArtta dAyini kAtyAyani gaurI gAciyunna nannu vEga kAvavE janani dEvi
